hizbs.text: alif-lam-meem-sad
kitabun unzila ilayka fala yakun fi sadrika harajun min'hu litundhira bihi wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
ittabiʿu ma unzila ilaykum min rabbikum wala tattabiʿu min dunihi awliyaa qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
wakam min qaryatin ahlaknaha fajaaha basuna bayatan aw hum qailuna
fama kana daʿwahum idh jaahum basuna illa an qalu inna kunna zalimina
falanasalanna alladhina ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna l-mur'salina
falanaqussanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wama kunna ghaibina
wal-waznu yawma-idhin l-haqu faman thaqulat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
waman khaffat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum bima kanu biayatina yazlimuna
walaqad makkannakum fi l-ardi wajaʿalna lakum fiha maʿayisha qalilan ma tashkuruna
walaqad khalaqnakum thumma sawwarnakum thumma qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa lam yakun mina l-sajidina
qala ma manaʿaka alla tasjuda idh amartuka qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
qala fa-ih'bit min'ha fama yakunu laka an tatakabbara fiha fa-ukh'ruj innaka mina l-saghirina
qala anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'ʿathuna
qala innaka mina l-munzarina
qala fabima aghwaytani la-aqʿudanna lahum sirataka l-mus'taqima
thumma laatiyannahum min bayni aydihim wamin khalfihim waʿan aymanihim waʿan shamailihim wala tajidu aktharahum shakirina
qala ukh'ruj min'ha madhuman madhuran laman tabiʿaka min'hum la-amla-anna jahannama minkum ajmaʿina
wayaadamu us'kun anta wazawjuka l-janata fakula min haythu shi'tuma wala taqraba hadhihi l-shajarata fatakuna mina l-zalimina
fawaswasa lahuma l-shaytanu liyub'diya lahuma ma wuriya ʿanhuma min sawatihima waqala ma nahakuma rabbukuma ʿan hadhihi l-shajarati illa an takuna malakayni aw takuna mina l-khalidina
waqasamahuma inni lakuma lamina l-nasihina

fadallahuma bighururin falamma dhaqa l-shajarata badat lahuma sawatuhuma watafiqa yakhsifani ʿalayhima min waraqi l-janati wanadahuma rabbuhuma alam anhakuma ʿan til'kuma l-shajarati wa-aqul lakuma inna l-shaytana lakuma ʿaduwwun mubinun
qala rabbana zalamna anfusana wa-in lam taghfir lana watarhamna lanakunanna mina l-khasirina
qala ih'bitu baʿdukum libaʿdin ʿaduwwun walakum fi l-ardi mus'taqarrun wamataʿun ila hinin
qala fiha tahyawna wafiha tamutuna wamin'ha tukh'rajuna
yabani adama qad anzalna ʿalaykum libasan yuwari sawatikum warishan walibasu l-taqwa dhalika khayrun dhalika min ayati l-lahi laʿallahum yadhakkaruna

yabani adama la yaftinannakumu l-shaytanu kama akhraja abawaykum mina l-janati yanziʿu ʿanhuma libasahuma liyuriyahuma sawatihima innahu yarakum huwa waqabiluhu min haythu la tarawnahum inna jaʿalna l-shayatina awliyaa lilladhina la yu'minuna
wa-idha faʿalu fahishatan qalu wajadna ʿalayha abaana wal-lahu amarana biha qul inna l-laha la yamuru bil-fahshai ataquluna ʿala l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
qul amara rabbi bil-qis'ti wa-aqimu wujuhakum ʿinda kulli masjidin wa-id'ʿuhu mukh'lisina lahu l-dina kama bada-akum taʿuduna
fariqan hada wafariqan haqqa ʿalayhimu l-dalalatu innahumu ittakhadhu l-shayatina awliyaa min duni l-lahi wayahsabuna annahum muh'taduna
